cityStructure

Class CityMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • sajas.core.Agent
      • cityStructure.CityMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sajas.core.TimerListener

    public class CityMap
extends sajas.core.Agent
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents the city structure and the connections between roads and intersections.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getTransitPenalty

        public static int getTransitPenalty(CityMap map,
                                    java.lang.String road)
        Static method that returns the transit penalty of a certain road belonging to a certain city structure. Penalty = (Number_of_semaphores_at_end_intersection - 1) * (time_yellow + time_green) / time_car_move_1_cell = Road_Length * 3 (if above is equal to 0) = Max(space_width,space_height) (if length is INFINITE)
        Parameters:
        map -
        road -
        Returns:
